sentences.english: The bine is erect, base ministry lignification, foliaceous each other is unripe, wrap around needle form or long elliptic.
sentences.chinese: 莖豎立，基部木質化，葉互生，披針形或長橢圓形。

sentences.english: Summer heat, has been out of bud and leaf stems.
sentences.chinese: 夏日炎炎，芽已抽出莖和葉。

sentences.english: The jars should not be packed so tightly that any single leaf could not be easily pulled out by its stem.
sentences.chinese: 的罐子，不應該裝得那麼緊，不容易被拉任何單葉莖。

sentences.english: The main stems of a plant show negative geotropism as they grow upwards.
sentences.chinese: 植物莖往上長時表現出負向地性。

sentences.english: The stems, the leaves, you make fodder for livestock.
Asiatic plant grown for its cluster of edible white stalks with dark green leaves.
sentences.chinese: 亞洲的植物，具有一叢可以喫的白莖和暗綠色的葉。

sentences.english: A slender stolon or prostrate stem rooting at the nodes or at the tip.
sentences.chinese: 在節處和莖的先端生根的纖細匍匐莖。

sentences.english: The bending of the stems as a result of horizontal storage, might be caused by the anti-geotropism.
sentences.chinese: 橫置貯藏老可能因背地性之關係，貯藏後莖呈彎曲。

sentences.english: And the different number of tillers had the most effect on rice yield.
sentences.chinese: 且不同莖櫱苗對產量的影響最大。

sentences.english: Minute fragments of shoot apices are proverbially difficult to culture .
sentences.chinese: 微小的莖尖切段通常是難以培養的。

sentences.english: My favorite is the taro stem and duck.
sentences.chinese: 而我最喜歡的就是祕製芋頭莖釀鴨肉。

sentences.english: Wall thickening ofCasparian strip is evident in its endodermis.
sentences.chinese: 莖有內皮層，凱氏帶加厚明顯。

sentences.english: The roots, stems and leaves of plants have different functions.
sentences.chinese: 植物的根，莖和葉有不同的作用。

sentences.english: Some stems might die completely but usually the plant will shoot from the base again .
sentences.chinese: 有些莖甚至會完全枯死，通常基本還是會萌發新枝。

sentences.english: The stems have coiling tendrils and are green, slender, and hairless.
sentences.chinese: 莖有卷鬚和卷取是綠色的，纖細，無毛。
